Types

MarkovGenerator = ref object
  samples: seq[string]
  wordProc: MarkovProcessWordProc
  cacheSamples: bool
  case kind*: MarkovGeneratorModelType
  of mgtSimple:
      seqModel: Table[string, seq[string]]

  of mgtWeighted:
      weightModel: Table[string, Table[string, int]]
